pull_request.title: [MBL-793/794] Update CardViewHolder ViewModels to RX2
pull_request.body:
# 📲 What

Update some more viewholder viewmodels to rx2

# 🤔 Why

We are updating everything to rx2 to assist with further updates

# 🛠 How

🧠 

# 📋 QA

Make sure the rewards card viewholders work and function as they used to

# Story 📖

pull_request.title: MBL-795: RewardsFragment Screen
pull_request.body:
# 📲 What

- Migration RXJava2 + ViewModel, take a look at the [engineering plan](https://kickstarter.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/NT/pages/2350317579/ViewModel+Tech+Debt+Epic) if any doubt 

# 👀 See

https://github.com/kickstarter/android-oss/assets/4083656/101e41c6-7267-4087-923d-8f56a63581a8



| --- | --- |
|  |  |

# 📋 QA
- Browse several projects open the rewards carousel for addons, rewards, as backer, ... etc.
- Browse several finalized projects open the rewards carousel if no backer.
- Browse several finalized projects as backer, the manage pledge screen should appear.

# Story 📖

[MBL-795](https://kickstarter.atlassian.net/browse/MBL-795)


[MBL-795]: https://kickstarter.atlassian.net/browse/MBL-795?atlOrigin=eyJpIjoiNWRkNTljNzYxNjVmNDY3MDlhMDU5Y2ZhYzA5YTRkZjUiLCJwIjoiZ2l0aHViLWNvbS1KU1cifQ

commits.message: remove the maison neue font family from the app (#1869)
remove button that would have lead to creator dashboard (#1868)

[MBL-1004] Remove unneeded files from vies we converted to compose (#1870)

* remove unneeded search files, add saveable to current search term to prevent loss of search on orientation change

* remove views from login flow that are no longer needed

[MBL-741] Update Activitysampleviewholderviewmodel to RX2 (#1873)

* update activitysampleviewholderviewmodel to rx2

* remove viewmodel extension

[MBL-802] Update ThanksShareHolderViewmodel to RX2 (#1872)

* update thanks share view holder viewmodel to use rx 2

* clear disposables

* remove viewmodel extension

[MBL-768] Update HelpSettingsActivity and ViewModel to RX2 (#1875)

* update helpsettingsactivity and viewmodel to RX2

* the viewmodel literally did nothing

* remove unneeded return
create chrom tab extension instead of webview loading of legal pages for login flow (#1877)

[MBL-784] Convert Paymentmethodsviewholderviewmodel to rx2 (#1878)

* convert paymentmethodsviewholderviewmodel to rx2

* LINT

[No ticket] Changes to address top crash (#1881)

* makes it so the exception does not crash, but continues on while notifying firebase

* add logs and prevent nulls from being pushed to bindData

---------

Co-authored-by: Isabel Martin <arkariang@gmail.com>
filter null to prevent crash, filter blank updates to prevent view from being shown (#1883)

pull_request.title: [MBL-796] Update RewardViewHolderVIewmodel to RX2
pull_request.body:
# 📲 What

Update RewardViewHolderVIewmodel to RX2 and removal of unused code

# 🤔 Why

Updating all those thigns

# 🛠 How

🧠 

# 📋 QA

Make sure the rewards are presented as expected on various projects:
- Ones with limited shipping
- Ones with limited rewards
- One that youve backed

# Story 📖

[MBL-796](https://kickstarter.atlassian.net/browse/MBL-796)
